title: Best 9 Local & Travel Apps for the Christmas & New Year Season!
review_html:
Are you looking for the best local & travel apps to help you enjoy the festive season in 2023? Whether you want to find the best deals, discover new places, plan your trips, or have some fun, there is an app for that. In this article, we will review the 9 most recommended local & travel apps for Americans to use during Christmas and New Year in 2023, and tell you why you should download them right now.

Â 

Expedia

Expedia is an app for you if you want to travel with confidence and convenience. Plus, you can earn double points on every booking with the Expedia Rewards program.

Expedia App

Travel & Local
4.8
Ratings
v19.43.1 Version
Expedia Developer
GET

Why you should download Expedia:

1. It is an app for finding the best deals, with exclusive discounts, rewards, and coupons for app users.

2. It is an app for saving time and hassle, with features such as mobile check-in, flight status updates, and itinerary sharing.

3. It is an app for being flexible, with free cancellation on most bookings and 24/7 customer support.

Â 

GetYourGuide

GetYourGuide lets you discover and book thousands of tours, attractions, and activities around the world, from skip-the-line tickets to the Eiffel Tower to helicopter rides over the Grand Canyon.

GetYourGuide

Travel & Local
4.2
Ratings
23.33.2 Version
GetYourGuide Developer
GET

Why you should download GetYourGuide:

1. It is an app for discovering new places, with curated and themed collections for different destinations and interests.

2. It is an app for booking easily, with instant confirmation, paperless tickets, and offline access.

3. It is an app for having fun, with live guides, audio guides, and interactive maps to enhance your experience.

Â 

Hostelworld

Hostelworld is an app for budget travelers who want to stay in hostels and meet other travelers. Hostelworld has over 36,000 hostels in more than 170 countries, with detailed information, photos, reviews, and ratings.

Hostelworld: Hostel Travel App

Travel & Local
4.8
Ratings
6.0 Version
Hostelworld.com Developer
GET

Why you should download Hostelworld:

1. It is an app for finding the best hostels, with features such as Hostel Awards, which highlight the top-rated hostels in different categories, and Hostel Standards, which ensure the quality and safety of the hostels.

2. It is an app for connecting with other travelers, with features such as Hostel Noticeboard, which lets you see and join events and activities in your hostel, and Hostel Chat, which lets you chat with other guests and staff.

3. It is an app for having fun, with features such as Hostel Stories, which lets you read and share your hostel experiences, and Hostel Tips, which gives you useful advice and recommendations for your trip.

Â 

Skyscanner

Skyscanner is an app for travelers who want to find the cheapest flights, hotels, and car rentals. Skyscanner compares millions of options from hundreds of providers and shows you the best deals and offers.

ï»¿Skyscanner

Travel & Local
4.8
Ratings
7.81 Version
Skyscanner Ltd Developer
GET

Why you should download Skyscanner:

1. It is an app for finding the cheapest flights, with features such as Explore, which lets you see the lowest prices to anywhere in the world, and Price Prediction, which tells you whether to book now or wait for a better deal.

2. It is an app for finding the best hotels and car rentals, with features such as Map View, which lets you see the location and price of your options, and Filters, which let you narrow down your search by star rating, amenities, and more.

3. It is an app for being flexible, with features such as Multi-city, which lets you book flights to multiple destinations in one go, and Everywhere, which lets you find the best deals to any destination.

Â 

Yelp

Yelp is an app for finding the best local businesses, from restaurants and bars to salons and spas. Yelp has over 200 million reviews from real customers, with photos, ratings, and tips.

Yelp

Travel & Local
4.6
Ratings
19.14.0-21048903 Version
Yelp, Inc Developer
GET

Why you should download Yelp:

1. It is an app for discovering new places, with features such as Collections, which let you browse curated lists of the best spots in your area, and Nearby, which lets you see whatâ€™s popular and trending around you.

2. It is an app for making smart decisions, with features such as Search Filters, which let you narrow down your options by price, category, distance, and more, and Compare, which lets you see the pros and cons of different places.

3. It is an app for having fun, with features such as Check-in, which lets you share your location and earn badges, and Talk, which lets you chat with other users and get recommendations.

Â 

Airbnb

Airbnb is an app for travelers who want to stay in unique and affordable accommodations. Airbnb lets you book over 7 million homes, apartments, and rooms around the world, from cozy cabins to luxury villas.

Why you should download Airbnb:

1. It is an app for finding the perfect place to stay, with features such as Wish Lists, which lets you save and share your favorite places, and Filters, which let you sort by price, location, amenities, and more.

2. It is an app for living like a local, with features such as Neighborhoods, which lets you explore different areas and their vibes, and Guides, which lets you access insider tips and recommendations from hosts and locals.

3. It is an app for having amazing experiences, with features such as Adventures, which lets you book multi-day trips with everything included, and Online Experiences, which lets you join live and interactive sessions from anywhere in the world.

Â 

Uber

Uber is an app for getting around with ease and convenience. Uber lets you request a ride, whether itâ€™s a car, a bike, a scooter, or a helicopter, and get picked up by a nearby driver.

Uber

Maps & Navigation
4.4

Why you should download Uber:

1. It is an app for getting around with ease and convenience, with features such as Scheduled Rides, which lets you book a ride in advance, and Uber Pool, which lets you share a ride and save money.

2. It is an app for getting around with safety and security, with features such as Share My Trip, which lets you share your location and ETA with your contacts, and Safety Toolkit, which lets you access emergency assistance and safety tips.

3. It is an app for getting around with style and comfort, with features such as Uber Black, which lets you ride in a luxury car with a professional driver, and Uber Comfort, which lets you ride in a spacious car with extra legroom and temperature control.

Â 

TripAdvisor

TripAdvisor is an app for travelers who want to plan and book their trips with confidence. TripAdvisor lets you browse over 830 million reviews and opinions from travelers like you, on hotels, restaurants, attractions, and more.

TripAdvisor

Travel & Local

Why you should download TripAdvisor:

1. It is an app for planning and booking your trips with confidence, with features such as Traveler Ranked, which lets you see the best-rated places based on traveler feedback, and Price Watch, which lets you see the best deals and offers for your trip.

2. It is an app for getting the most out of your trips, with features such as Near Me, which lets you see whatâ€™s nearby and available, and Trips, which lets you create and access your personalized travel plans.

3. It is an app for sharing your trips, with features such as Travel Timeline, which lets you capture and share your travel moments, and Write a Review, which lets you share your opinions and tips with other travelers.

Â 

Groupon

Groupon is an app for finding the best deals on everything you need, from restaurants and spas to electronics and travel. Groupon lets you browse and buy thousands of deals, with discounts up to 70%.

Groupon

Shopping

Why you should download Groupon:

1. It is an app for finding the best deals, with features such as Nearby, which let you see the deals closest to you, and Featured, which let you see the most popular and trending deals.

2. It is an app for saving money, with features such as Groupon Bucks, which lets you earn and use credits for your purchases, and Groupon Select, which lets you access exclusive deals and discounts for a monthly fee.

3. It is an app for having fun, with features such as Groupon Live, which lets you buy tickets for concerts, sports, and events, and Groupon Getaways, which lets you book travel deals and packages.

Â 

We hope you enjoyed this article and found it helpful. These are the 9 most recommended local & travel apps for Americans to use during Christmas and New Year in 2023, and we think you should download them right now. Trust us, you wonâ€™t regret it.
